content: around until you reach the first half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch at the top of the first chain 2 3 chain 1 single_crochet around until you reach the last stitch before the first chain 2 space single_crochet in this stitch 3 single_crochet in chain 2 space skip the half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet in the chain 2 space skip the half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet in the chain 2 space skip the half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet in the chain 2 space single_crochet in the next half_double_crochet and continue single_crochet around until you reach the first single_crochet join with a sl st to first single_crochet and tie off weave in ends repeat this with the other glove making sure to fit it to the opposite hand of the one you just worked this pattern is copyright 2008 by nichole m verville this pattern is not to be sold except with permission from me you may sell the finished product of this pattern as long as i am credited for the pattern you may use this pattern for personal use as long as i am credited for the pattern
